column2: "... Okay! Verification complete! Your accounts are linked without a problem!"
"Make sure to turn in your Client Order to receive your reward, if not done so already."
"Next up is this...! A \"PSO2es\" Login Bonus!"
"With your accounts linked, once you log into \"PSO2es\"..."
"You'll receive some EXP tickets and 1 Star Gem, each and every single day!"
"And for every 5 days you log in, there's even an additional bonus!"
"If you carry out ARKS operations diligently day by day, be sure not to miss this!"
"Those quests and this quest ... I want to go also this, but what shall I do?"
"In that case, \"Quick Search\" of \"PSO2es\" is recommended!"
"If you have \"PSO2es\", then without logging into \"PSO2\"..."
"You can clear certain quests from your smartphone in a flash!"
"You can clear the Ultimate Quest a certain number of times each day."
"This time, a new adventure will begin in \"PSO2es\"!"
"With the energetic and cute \"Gene\" and the Weaponoid \"More\"."
"You will follow a case involving a team with these two people."
"Of course, I'll continue to help you!"
"If you haven't played \"PSO2es\" yet, give it a try!"
"We are waiting for you with a wonderful group \"PSO2es\"!"
"Fighting together, a Pet that shares joy and sadness... It's a very loving occasion."
"I want to train such Pets anytime, anywhere! I want to be with you! Have you ever thought that?"
"Achieving this is the \"Pet Development\" function of \"PSO2es\"!"
"With \"PSO2es\", you can feed your pet(s) by giving eggs, anytime, anywhere!"
"Not only can you feed your Pet(s) with Eggs, but you can also use Chips from \"PSO2es\" as well!"
"Every Pet that you train in \"PSO2es\", a portion of the Experience gained is transferred into the \"Summoner\" class on \"PSO2\"."
"There are lots of Collection Materials! There's no Storage place for that too!"
"Good news for everyone who have such a problem!"
"Storage that can be used for both \"PSO2es\" and \"PSO2\" has appeared! It's called \"PSO2es Storage\"!"
"Anyone who is linked with \"PSO2es\" can use it!"
"And wow! With this Storage, you can store up to 100 items!"
"Furthermore, this Storage is linked with PSO2es, so if you store your frequently used items here..."
"You can withdraw them from \"PSO2\" as well as \"PSO2es\"!"

"便利な機能だと思われませんか！？
これを機に、『ＰＳＯ２ｅｓ』へ
ログインしてみてくださいね！"
"Everyone who has already played \"PSO2es\", please do use it!"
"The rewards for this Collection Sheet look nice! However, considering the remaining time, it seems difficult to achieve..."
"If you have this problem, we recommend the linked function \"Collection Search\" of \"PSO2es\"!"
"If you have \"PSO2es\", then without logging into \"PSO2\"..."
"Collection Sheets possessed by \"PSO2\" can be completed from your smartphone!"
"Collection Search can be used a certain number of times every day. Give it a try!"
"My name is Seraphy. I serve as Administrator to all things \"PSO2es\"."
"Please cooperate in order to make a better organization!"
"If I had to name one of the big advantages to using \"PSO2es\", it would definitely be \"Shared EXP\"!"
"When you log into \"PSO2\" after earning exp in \"PSO2es\", it is instantly applied to the same class(es)."
"It's a really convenient way to level up your subclasses in your spare time!"
"Are you currently raising any Mags, <%me>?"
"Well, with \"PSO2es\", you can continue feeding them anywhere, anytime!"
"I'm sure your little buddy will enjoy spending more time with you, too!"
"Be sure to make use of this helpful feature!"
"\"PSO2es\" holds a number of special events, including Emergency Quests."
"Some of these allow you to obtain powerful weapons, unique to \"PSO2es\"!"
"Try participating whenever you can, and see what special items you get!"
"Oh, no! Arrived late for the EQ and can't find an MPA? Prevent that from happening with \"Push Notifications\"!"
"Once enabled, this feature notifies you fifteen minutes before an EQ starts in \"PSO2\"."
"And for premium users, the notification comes one hour in advance!!"
"Use that advance notice to get ready for EQs stress-free!"
"Aw... I wonder if anything sold in my shop..."
"It's times like these that the \"My Shop\" feature comes in handy!"
"Anytime, anywhere! Search for items, or check for sales!"
"Snatch up those important items before someone else does, right from \"PSO2es\"!"
"Vital to your \"PSO2es\" adventure are chips, stored with things such as enemy data."
"It may surprise you to learn that I'm actually studying them on my own."
"I'd be delighted if you could assist me in my research, <%me>!"
"If you have the time, do stop by my roo--, I mean, the \"Chip Laboratory\", in \"PSO2es\"!"
"He-hello there. Thank you for your hard work as always."
"Say, if you have any spare time between missions... could you stop by to chat?"
"I love hearing stories such as, 'Aw man, I can't believe I did that!' Or, 'You won't believe how bad that Quest went!'~♪"
"Eh, erm... as an Administrator, I need to be made aware about those kinds of events, too..."
"So, yeah! Make sure to visit time to time!"
"My name is Seraphy. I serve as Administrator to all things \"PSO2es\"."
"And on that topic, I'm here to introduce some very helpful features from \"PSO2es\"."
"Talk to me again when you've gained access to the \"Volcanic Caverns\"!"
